title: Greek Root Words in English
description: Explore the ancient Greek roots that form the foundation of countless English words in science, medicine, and everyday life!

questions.question: The word 'philosophy' comes from the Greek 'philosophia.' What does it literally mean?

Which Greek root meaning 'life' gives us words like 'biology' and 'biography'?
The word 'chronology' contains the Greek root 'chronos.' What does 'chronos' mean?
Which Greek root meaning 'self' appears in words like 'automobile' and 'autobiography'?
The word 'photography' combines two Greek roots. What does 'photos' mean?
Which Greek root meaning 'earth' gives us words like 'geography' and 'geology'?
